'''Sony VGN-UX70:'''

This is a Japanese Model, so it has slightly more features than the equivalent models sold in the US under the models VGN-UX180P and VGN-UX280P and VGN-UX280P-7

'''Specifications:'''

* Intel Duo Core Solo U1300 （1.06 GHz）
* 30GB Harddisk
* 512MB RAM
* Windows XP Home 
* Intel GFX accelerator 950 (128MB shared)
* Internal : 1024×600 4.5" Touch Screen
* External output :1600x1200, 1360ｘ768, 1280x1024, 1280x800, 1280x768, 1024ｘ768, 1024ｘ600, 800x600
* Ports: Hi-Speed USB(USB2.0) x 1, headphone jack x 1, Mic Jack x 1, DC IN x 1(for AC adapter), I/O conector x 1
* Connectivity: 54Mbits IEEE802.11a/b/g, WPA, Wi-Fi compatible, Bluetooth (Bluetooth2.0+EDR compatible), 10/100 Mbps LAN (Via  Dongle)
* Additional storage: MemoryStick PRO Duo slot x1, CF Slot x1 (Type II)
* Biometrics Security: Finger print reader
* Camera: Web Camera <MOTION EYE> x2 : 31,000 pixel internal camera (f=2.6mm F4). 1.3 Mega pixel external camera (f=3.8mm F4)
* Contactless Smart card reader (Japanese Felecia) see http://www.sony.net/Products/felica/csy/index.html
* Japanese TV Tuner
